author: tlsalex
body:
I always write an image to USB stick with rufus , a 3rd part tool.
I wonder whether windows will have that kind of native cmdlet can do that job.
just like "dd" ship with linux.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @tlsalex Please use forums and etc. to ask questions not related PowerShell dev process.

title: which native cmdlet or cmd can write an image to a USB stick.
